other_tests.findings: A novel homozygous L222P mutation in CYP11A1 gene was identified.
P450scc activity of L222P mutant was approximately 7% compared with the wild type.
Elevated plasma ACTH level (325.7 pg/ml; normal range, 0.8–58) while on treatment.

At age 10: dehydro-epiandrosterone sulfate and 17-hydroxyprogesterone were below detection limits. At age 14: LH level was 37.2 mU/l (normal range, 0.5–2.0); FSH was 25.7 mU/l (normal range, 0.4–1.7); testosterone was 0.26 ng/ml (normal range, 1.6–4.0).
other_tests.changes_over_time: Showed progression from partial steroidogenic function to complete adrenal and gonadal failure.
